summary: The slide presents the recursive definition of value in a manner similar to the expectimax algorithm. It includes formulas for calculating the value of a state (V*(s)) and the action-value function (Q*(s, a)). A diagram illustrates the relationship between states, actions, and transitions, highlighting the recursive nature of the value calculation.
